channel.title: Having a force text when using a special attack ~ help ~
channel.description: Hey, I'm trying to code it so that when using a special attack on a weapon, it forces a message such as when using a dragon dagger and using the special attack, you shout "dds go!" ect ect. Anyone know how to do this? Thanks in advance

item.title: Having a force text when using a special attack ~ help ~
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

iamlies:

I don’t have the weaponID method on my server, it’s project insanity but was called “TorvaPkz” before I added a lot of things and changed some stuff.

Use this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ddsid){ do something }

Read full topic
item.source: Having a force text when using a special attack ~ help ~

item.title: Having a force text when using a special attack ~ help ~
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“iamlies, post:8, topic:431936”]Thank you very much, I shall try this now

edit:
I tried this and came up with two errors which I fixed one. Here is the compiler data for the other error:

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1261: error: cannot find
ymbol
if(weaponID == 1215){
^
symbol: variable weaponID
location: class ClickingButtons
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

here is the code:
if(weaponID == 1215){
c.forcedChat(“red:DDS GO!”);
}[/quote]
I don’t know if your server is using the weaponid method. Else try if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == dds

Read full topic

item.title: Having a force text when using a special attack ~ help ~
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“iamlies, post:1, topic:431936”]Hey, I’m trying to code it so that when using a special attack on a weapon, it forces a message such as when using a dragon dagger and using the special attack, you shout “dds go!” ect ect. Anyone know how to do this?
Thanks in advance[/quote]
In the method where you handle the special attack add something like.

if(weaponID == ddsid){ forcetext("your text"); }

Read full topic
